【合併】総合日本学習科目（グローバル化世界における日本）（CIEC）/Japan in a Globalizing World（国際学部）
授業の概要・背景: The course consists of four parts. After an introductory part, the second part introduces Japan in a globalizing world through a historical perspective. This section also introduces basic research method in social sciences using the case of Japan. The third part consists of a series of case studies done by students and the final part summarizes the findings from this course.
授業方法:
Most sessions are seminars. The first two parts are mostly led by the instructor. They are based on readings, documentaries and other visual productions. Students carry out case studies after approval by the instructor. The research results will be presented in the 3rd part of the seminar. Active participation in discussion and classes is essential. Students who have any concerns should consult the instructor via email, mito@kwansei.ac.jp. Otherwise, all communication will be done via LUNA.
